channel.title: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?"

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: ill admit that till season 4 its somewhat worthless, but its not like its that hard to get anyways imo.

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded:
In S1-S3, my experience was that I had the level I needed to do any exam by the time I needed to take the exam. That is, when I hit Chunin, just by focusing on getting 3 lvl. 2 allies, doing some initial reaper stuff and trade stuff, I managed to get the levels I needed for the Sp. Jonin exam. Then, as a Sp. Jonin, doing Reaper, Wasteland, Trade, and more Lvl. 2's, I found I had the levels I needed before taking the Jonin exam. Those are the only times you need to rush levels (unless you're trying to rush to loop).

So, to turn on Out on Top, you need to turn off the theme that doubles your chance of leveling allies. Generally speaking, the amount of times you'll need to do that is quite small.

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: no Uzuki is right the only use for Out On Top theme would be trying to get thro a season as quickly as you can , and P.S Uzuki would get alot more use out of it then a new guy since he can level to what are you season 5 Uzuki so he can level to around Level 114

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded:
@uzuki: thats because you have everything in the game

i found it quite usefull for speed running through seasons to get bloodline related items

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: Out on top is actually a useless theme. There's no reason to get it unless you're just being obsessive.

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: you should at least hit sannin and try for out on top… its easyer during S1

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: certain things give you different items depending on what starting bloodline you have when you do it, plus Whiteeye gets a lot less useful in S2+ once you have Stand By Your Ninja.

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: What does finishing it with different bloodlines do o.0 I don't really want to be anything other than White Eye

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: oh and note sure you can always just wait untill next season to do anything but lets just say you need to finish WasteLand with all 3 starter bloodlines so you need to change bloodlines each season and finish it 3 times atleast so sooner is better

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded:
I'd say finish WasteLand, Finsh Reaper missions, Get 15 wins in the arena to get get your warrior item and bloodline power , make sure you get The Letter of marque, get as many arena items as you can, beat BurgerNinja if you can and get Sanin, Try to win Monster drops and farm for WasteLand Runes

Did I miss anything?

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: That's pretty much what I wanted to know, if I could miss anything somehow :3 so yay if I can't!

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: There is nothing that you cant do later on. Some things require season 2+ or 3+, but nothing requires being in a certain season.

item.title: Re: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: It might help if you tell us what you've already done.

item.title: Is there anything I need to make sure I do while on S1?
item.content:encoded: Just so I don't miss anything :3 Missing things forever is bad…
